name: Candy Story Sweet
description:
New innovative Match 3 puzzle game has arrived!
Enjoy Candy Story Sweet for free! Start your sweet journey in this legendary puzzle adventure!

Features:
Hundreds of delicious levels to enjoy.
Amazing power-ups, boosters and exciting bonuses.
Play at your own pace and enjoy the sweetest match 3 puzzle game.
Swap and blast your way through loads of sugary worlds.
Free to play and totally addictive.
